review: Well this hotel is kind of a farm house . You'll feel like you are living in your own house located in a village. Here you'll see the beauty of villages their crops cultivation. For solo riders this is one of the best place to stay as it a calm place where you can enjoy your peace. Food is good as well staff there
name: 705onams

review: AgroTourism  is concept where one  stays in a farm  enjoying naturally grown foods and dairy products  tranquil place by the river Beas.  It offers a genuine farm stay run by a local family with various options from budget rooms to private cottages by the river.
name: Himanshu S
